titles.title: Civil Service Retirement Spousal Benefits Act of 1987
A bill to extend the date that an application must be filed for former spouses to receive certain retirement benefits under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

committee.subcommittee: Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 5/28/1987--Introduced. Civil Service Retirement Spousal Benefits Act of 1987 - Amends the Civil Service Retirement Spouse Equity Act of 1984 to extend the deadline by which an application must be filed for former spouses to receive certain retirement benefits from May 8, 1987, to May 8, 1989.
